data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Juninho Bacuna is booked for the away team.
In the minute 23, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Harry Toffolo.
Huddersfield's Ben Hamer has been booked in Swansea.
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Andre Ayew.
Tony Harrington blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, At Liberty Stadium, Isaac Mbenza has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Jake Bidwell for Swansea has been booked by Tony Harrington and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Richard Stearman (Huddersfield) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team replace Isaac Mbenza with Fraizer Campbell.
In the minute 62, Steve Cooper is making the team's first substitution at Liberty Stadium with Kasey Palmer replacing Viktor Gyokeres.
Goal! Huddersfield have got their heads in front thanks to a Josh Koroma strike.
Huddersfield make their second substitution with Lewis O'Brien replacing Juninho Bacuna.
In the minute 81, Jordan Garrick is replacing Kyle Naughton for the home team.
Steve Cooper (Swansea) is making a third substitution, with Liam Cullen replacing Jamal Lowe.
Demeaco Duhaney is replacing Carel Eiting for Huddersfield at Liberty Stadium.
